definition: Feast at Hongmen/(fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest/refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3]
eastern bean goose/great/large

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
feast/repose

sentences.english: "White Vengeance", also known as Hongmen Yan, is another highly anticipated Chinese historical flick.
sentences.chinese: 《鴻門宴》是另一部備受期待的中國歷史電影。

sentences.english: Sol Campbell can cope with the hostile reception which awaits him at White Hart Lane, according to Gael Clichy.
sentences.chinese: 克利希認爲坎貝爾能夠應對白鹿巷給他擺下的鴻門宴。

hoodlum/bad guy
to charge and break through enemy lines
to be reluctant to give up a post
to die in battle (idiom)
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
fight to the death/desperate struggle
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
to feel embarrassed/to feel akward
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield

lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
